country.description: Country where the weather data was recorded. In this case, it is India.

location_name.description: Name of the location in India where the weather data was recorded.

region.description: Region of the location where the weather data was recorded.

latitude.description: Latitude of the location where the weather data was recorded.

longitude.description: Longitude of the location where the weather data was recorded.

timezone.description: Timezone of the location where the weather data was recorded.

last_updated_epoch.description: The last time when the data was updated in epoch format.

last_updated.description: The last time when the data was updated in human readable format.

condition_text.description: Textual description of the weather condition.

wind_mph.description: Wind speed recorded in miles per hour.

wind_kph.description: Wind speed recorded in kilometers per hour.

gust_mph.description: Gust speed recorded in miles per hour.

gust_kph.description: Gust speed recorded in kilometers per hour.

air_quality_Carbon_Monoxide.description: Air quality measurement for Carbon Monoxide.

air_quality_Nitrogen_dioxide.description: Air quality measurement for Nitrogen Dioxide.

air_quality_Sulphur_dioxide.description: Air quality measurement for Sulphur Dioxide.

air_quality_PM2.5.description: Air quality measurement for PM2.5 particles.

air_quality_PM10.description: Air quality measurement for PM10 particles.

value_dict.Waxing Gibbous: Moon phase where the moon is more than half illuminated but not full.
value_dict.Full Moon: Moon phase where the moon is fully illuminated.
value_dict.Waning Gibbous: Moon phase where the moon is less than fully illuminated but more than half.
value_dict.Last Quarter: Moon phase where the left half of the moon is illuminated.
value_dict.Waning Crescent: Moon phase where the moon is less than half illuminated after being full.
value_dict.New Moon: Moon phase where the moon is not illuminated.
value_dict.Waxing Crescent: Moon phase where the moon is less than half illuminated after being a new moon.
value_dict.First Quarter: Moon phase where the right half of the moon is illuminated.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in meteorology.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the weather conditions, please predict the temperature in Celsius.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted temperature in Celsius is ______.
